description:
Kevin is a student living in the Pacific Northwest. He's a pretty hardcore snowboarder who likes to hit slopes as often as he can. Kevin is a little shy at first, but opens up once he gets to know ya.
He's got a girlfriend that he met online, and they seem pretty serious for being so young.
Kevin is long and lean, (and so is his dick!) with dark brown hair offset dramatically with crystal blue eyes.
Enjoy!
title: Kevin - Solo
